title: Not Receiving Chests on S Ranks
body: Hey, I got 2 S's with characters i never used and I did not get any boxes. Is it disabled for norms or preseason.

replies.body: Kokua has a great point, definitely check your profile to make sure you have a chest icon available.  You'll also need to own your champion in order to grab one of these mastery chests, more info also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thanks, I was unaware about the chest slots every 7 days.

Are you sure that you still have any chests remaining to earn? If you go to your profile, you'll see just how many more chests you can earn, and when your next chest will be available. To answer your followup question, no, they should not be disabled.
